alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 03 at 3:54PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A wet pattern will continue as Invest 98 W continues to organize to our west. This will favor shower and thunderstorm development over the next few days, with periods of heavy rainfall likely. This could lead to additional runoff issues which may result in flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
